data.title: Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: The Sage Group Plc engages in the provision of business management solutions. It offers accounting, enterprise resource planning and payroll software.
data.text:

Jake Paul has said he wants to win a world title in boxing, and he could be closer than anyone thinks.

Christian Dior Parfums has sponsored an exhibition at Château de Versailles by artist Eva Jospin who has also designed limited edition trunks for its Miss Dior scent.

Claressa Shields climbs back into the boxing ring on Saturday and is challenging for a world title at heavyweight against champion Vanessa Lepage-Joanisse.

Rematches will rule at UFC 304. On Saturday in Manchester, England, Leon Edwards will defend his UFC welterweight title against Belal Muhammad in the main event.

The NBA secured a multibillion dollar deal with Amazon and NBC this month, giving TNT a chance to match the terms of the arrangement so it could continue its 34-year partnership with the league.
